text.section: There is a Division of Pretrial Detention and Services in the Department.

The Division consists of:
a Pretrial Release Services Program;
a Baltimore City Detention Center; and
a centralized booking facility for Baltimore City.

The Division has the same authority with regard to the custody of its inmates and the operation of the Baltimore City Detention Center as:
the Division of Correction has under this Code with regard to the custody of its inmates and the operation of the Division of Correction; and
the sheriffs have under this Code with regard to the detention of inmates committed to their custody and the operation of local correctional facilities.
This title does not limit or supersede the authority of a court to determine the conditions of pretrial release.
